sn46.41:1.2: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va tisso vidha pajahimsu, sabbe te sattannam bojjhanganam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn46.41:1.3: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va tisso vidha pajahissanti, sabbe te sattannam bojjhanganam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn46.41:1.4: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samana va brahmana va tisso vidha pajahanti, sabbe te sattannam bojjhanganam bhavitatta bahulikatatta.
sn46.41:1.7: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va tisso vidha pajahimsu …pe…
sn46.41:1.9: pajahanti, sabbe te imesamyeva sattannam bojjhanganam bhavitatta bahulikatatta”ti.
